problems.title: Find All Anagrams In A String (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given two strings s and p, return an array of all the start indices of p's anagrams in s. You may return the answer in any order.

Input Format:
First line: string s.
Second line: string p.

Output Format:
Print the start indices on a single line, separated by spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
cbaebabacd
abc

Sample Output
0 6
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length, p.length <= 3 * 10^4
s and p consist of lowercase English letters.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
